description: Defines a minimal Confluence client with initialization and asynchronous search capabilities.

methods.name: __init__(self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None)
methods.description: Initializes the Confluence client with optional base URL and access token.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search_pages(self, query: str)
methods.description: Asynchronously searches pages with a given query, returning a stubbed result.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None):$/
ctags.signature: (self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None)

ctags.name: search_pages
ctags.pattern: /^    async def search_pages(self, query: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
